title: El don de Alba
overview: Alba Rivas has the gift of seeing, hearing and feeling the presence of souls that, little by little, have been integrated into her life thanks to the help of her grandmother. The young woman has just moved to live in Bellavista to run an antiques business with a good friend. But her life takes a turn when her grandmother, from whom she has inherited that gift, informs her that she has been chosen to continue the mission to which she has always dedicated herself: to show the path of light to the souls in transit that they maintain. debts and pending issues with the world of the living. Spanish remake of the American series "Entre fantasmas", starring Jennifer Love Hewitt.
